message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $950,000.  I'm confident this will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. However, $700,000 is significantly below its true value and my minimum acceptable price.  To find a middle ground, I propose $875,000.

I understand that you have a certain attachment to the product, but $875,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $825,000. I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.
